pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, November 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, November 19, 2016:

Lima, Peru

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman of the Board of Mitsubishi Heavy Industries

Hilton Lima Miraflores
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Pedro Pablo Kuczynski, President of the Republic of Peru

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Trans Pacific Partnership Leaders hosted by Barack Obama, President of the United States of America

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Trần Đại Quang, President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Enrique Peña Nieto, President of the United Mexican States

Hilton Lima Miraflores
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Leaders’ Official Dinner

Lima Convention Centre
Lima, Peru

Note for media:

  • Closed to media


Note: All times are local


PMO Media Relations:

613-957-5555
